L2_gloss: (Gilgiti) A consonant letter of the Shina abjad.
A consonant letter of the Shina abjad.
The twenty-third letter of the Shina abjad.
A letter of the Shina abjad, representing the retroflex nasal.
Used to represent the [ɛ~ɛ̥] sound in Shina. [3]
Used to represent the [ʈʂ] sound in Shina. [1]
Used to represent the [ʈ͡ʂʰ] sound in Shina. [1]
Used to represent the [b~β] sound in Shina. [1]
Used to represent the [ʐ] sound in Shina. [1]
Used to represent the [h~ɦ] sound in Shina. [2]
